text: Paul Mensah (born 13 October 1999) is a Ghanaian professional footballer. He plays as a forward for Blau-Weiß Linz. ==Career== Mensah started his career at Crystal Palace Akosombo in Ghana. In August 2018 he moved to the Austrian second division club Kapfenberger SV. In this month he debuted in the 2nd division versus Floridsdorfer AC. On the fourth day of that season, Mensah scored his first goal for KSV in a 3-1 win against SK Vorwärts Steyr. In three seasons he played 73 second division matches and scored 16 goals. After the 2020/21 season he left KSV. He then moved to Romania for the 2021/22 season for first division club FC Botoșani. He then returned to Austria in January 2022 and signed a contract with second division club FC Blau-Weiss Linz that ran until June 2023.Blau Weiß Linz Homepage (German) With the club he reached the promotion to the Austrian Bundesliga in the 2022-23 season. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Blau-Weiß Linz players
title: Paul Mensah
